TI: [Electric activity of hippocampal neurons during asphyxia].
AB: The unit activity was studied in the dorsal and ventral hippocampus of anesthetized and immobilized cats. The state of asphyxia was caused by disconnection of artificial respiration for 3-9 min. The hypoxia induced phasic changes of the neuronal activity. Hippocampal neurons revealed a higher resistance against oxygen deficiency as compared to other brain areas.
TT: Elektricheskaia aktivnost' neironov gippokampa pri asfiksii.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1986 Jun;72(6):737-43.
